import React, { useContext, useEffect, useRef } from "react"; import SignUpContext from "./context/SignUpContext"; const SignUp = () => { const { signUpShow, setSignUpShow } = useContext(SignUpContext); const drawerRef = useRef(null); useEffect(() => { const closeDrawer = (event) => { if (drawerRef.current.contains(event.target)) { return; } setSignUpShow(false); }; document.addEventListener("mousedown", closeDrawer); return () => document.removeEventListener("mousedown", closeDrawer); }); return (
@
); }; export default SignUp;
